question: The "Lake Abijatta" and "Lake Shalla" are the important alkaline rift valley lakes of which country?
explanation: Lake Abijatta and Lake Shalla are the two important alkaline rift valley lakes of Ethiopia. Both lakes are located in Abijatta-Shalla National Park. Lake Shalla is famous for sulphur springs and Pelican Island which houses great white pelicans. Both are important tourist attractions also.
